title: UFO Ghana: Otumfuo’s Mediation Could End Years of Bloodshed in Bawku
description: News Ghana, Latest Updates and Breaking News of Ghana, Isaac Kofi Dzokpo, https://www.newsghana.com.gh/ufo-ghana-otumfuos-mediation-could-end-years-of-bloodshed-in-bawku/The Universal Friendship Organization Ghana (UFO Ghana) has commended the Asantehene, Otumfuo Osei Tutu II, for presenting a mediation report to President John Mahama, describing the move as a demonstration of his commitment to promoting peace and stability in Ghana. The organisation said the effort underscores the importance of collaboration between government and traditional authorities [...] News Ghana, Latest Updates and Breaking News of Ghana, Isaac Kofi Dzokpo, https://www.newsghana.com.gh/ufo-ghana-otumfuos-mediation-could-end-years-of-bloodshed-in-bawku/

title: Hollywood Minute: First look at Steven Spielberg’s new UFO film
description: First look at Spielberg's "Disclosure Day,' Rolling Stones cancel tour, and 'The Pitt' season two trailer. Douglas Hyde reports.

title: 'Aliens Among Us': Ex-Officials Break Silence on Decades of Government UFO Secrets
description: Former US officials and intelligence figures break their silence on decades of UFO secrecy as a new documentary claims non human technology has been hidden for 80 years.

title: Steven Spielberg's UFO thriller 'Disclosure Day' reveals humanity's first contact with aliens
description: The first trailer offers a tantalizing glimpse into a story that promises to shake the world with revelations about alien life, while keeping much of the plot shrouded in mystery.
